title: 위치와 가성비 모두 만족입니다”
content: 시내중심에 있고 밤 늦게 다녀도 안전해요

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 두번째방문”
content: 위치가 너무 좋아서 두번째 방문 했습니다.

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 주변 호텔중에는 최고인듯”
content: 가성비 좋습니다. 위치는 최고입니다. 시설은 조금 노후되었지만 주변에 비해 괜찮았습니다.

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 위치 최상”
content: 위치는 최고입니다. 소나로사 가깝고 주변에 식당도 많습니다.

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 별로였음”
content:
1. 룸 컨디션 별로(세면대 및 변기 막혀 있음)
2. 요청사항 친절하게 듣기만 함.(조치는 3-4번 요청 필요)
3. 업무 체계 이상함.(방 교체 후 수리하러 와서 전에 묵은 방 몇 혼지 손님한테 오히려 물어보러 옴)
4. 침대 매트릭스 최악

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 좋은 선택”
content: 맛있는 조식, 깨끗한 방, 안전한 위치.

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 위치와 가성비 좋습니다”
content: 위치가 한인타운에 가깝고 어디든 가기 좋은 위치입니다

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 매우 좋음”
content:
직원들은 딱히 친절하지 않고 데면데면함. 조식은 왜 그런 이상한 시스템으로 줄서서 기다려 들어가야 하는지 모르겠음.

그래도 멕시코시티 내에서 안전한 구역내에 위치한 괜찮은 호텔에 주변에 먹을데도 많으니 다음에도 여기 묵을 듯.

hotel_name: 갈레리아 플라자 레포르마 (Galeria Plaza Reforma)
title: 좋은편”
content:
안전하고 좋아요 방음은 1도 안됩니다 ㅎㅎ
여자 혼자 묵기에도 시설좋고 얼리체크인 비용도 저렴한 편이에요
근데 동네자체가 광화문 강남 느낌이라서, 센트럴 쪽 분위기가 첫방문 때는 더 좋은거같아요

hotel_name: 쉐라톤 멕시코 시티 마리아 이사벨 호텔 (Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel)
title: 쉐라톤 호텔 최고입니다”
content: 위치도 너무 좋고 시설도 너무 좋고 여행의 피로도 다 풀고 잘 쉬다가 갑니다. 추천추천 드려요

hotel_name: 쉐라톤 멕시코 시티 마리아 이사벨 호텔 (Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel)
title: 안전한 동네 위치 너무 좋음”
content: 직원들도 친절하고 호텔 위치도 안전하고 좋았습니다. 방음은 좋지 않습니다. 벽지나 가구, 조명이 낡고 얼룩이 있으나 이용하는데 불편한 느낌은 아닙니다 호텔이 오래되서 그런거 같습니다. 방이 좀 추웠는데 온도조절기로는 난방을 할 수 없었습니다. 벤틸레이션 돌아가는 소리가  들리나 크게 거슬리지는 않습니다.

hotel_name: 쉐라톤 멕시코 시티 마리아 이사벨 호텔 (Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel)
title: 방의 위치가 중요한 숙소”
content: 처음에 저렴한 방으로 결제했을때는 건물 뒷편과 엘리베이터도 뒤에있어서 정말 별로였어요.. 그래서 추가 요금을 내니 본관에 있는 방은 좋았어요! 독립기념비도 잘 보이고..그런데 방에 휴지통이 하나라 불편했고 클럽라운지 음식은 별로였네요..

hotel_name: Mondrian Mexico City Condesa
title: home sweet home”
content: i stayed a week here and i enjoyed my time here very much. i was always greeted no matter time of day, and everyone onsite was super kind and helpful. the rooms were spacious and comfy, would definitely stay here again. it was centrally located, and there is a bike share dock right outside the hotel. nearby some great eats and drinks, even in the hotel. loved the gym it had peloton treads!

hotel_name: Mondrian Mexico City Condesa
title: Very nice stay”
content: Great stay.  Very nice staff. Clean.  Nice shared lobby space with the Andaz and access to access rooftops.  It was not noisey as some reviews suggested.

hotel_name: Mondrian Mexico City Condesa
title: 좋음”
content:
剛好遇到F1賽事期間，因此覺得房間品質沒有符合房價
備品沒有牙刷，然後忘記給肥皂（因為同事房間有），房間內只有廁所有垃圾桶，垃圾都要走進浴室丟很不方便
另外明明已經在Agoda 上付費，拿出證明後櫃檯依舊要信用卡過卡（說法是Mini bar的押金，刷卡的費用卻是整筆房費）
退房時給了一張帳單要我們再付錢，請他確認後才說是誤會，會再將我們原本的押金刷退，但已經退房五天了尚未收到刷退通知

hotel_name: Mondrian Mexico City Condesa
title: Excellent staff, comfortable new hotel”
content:
Love the staff here. Special shoutout to Hemina and Yamal, concierge Salvadore and Marian, and Andre who checked us in late at midnight. Everyone is super welcoming and helpful 
Hotel is new. Convenient location to eateries. 
Highly recommend this cozy hotel

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: 너무 조아요 ”
content:
깨끗하고 수영장도 여러개에 조식이 너무맛있음 
요일마다 낮, 저녁에 이벤트를 여러가지 운영
 영화  보는날, 멕시코 춤 공연하는날, 신나는 펍 운영하는날 등등 다양함 
 깨끗하구 넓고 좋슴다  맞은편 식당 두개 가봤는데 둘다 좋아요

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: 위치 굿”
content: 위치는 좋습니다 바다 뷰도 좋고 올인 가기전에 저렴하게 호텔존 즐기기에 좋습니다 프뤈트줵웬듈벨료얀쳰졀햔겼같야요오히려그조식식당직원들이훨쳰졀해요 동양인1도없습니다. 프라이빗 해수욕장 굳입니다

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: very good. best choice.”
content:
다른 호들텔 보다 좋습았니다.
훨훨배배~~ 

직원들 친철하고, 깨끗하고, 수영장 어른용 아이용 나눠져있습니다.
또하나 좋았던 점은 첫째날 늦게 도착해서 올인클루시브를 선택하지 않았습니다만 가보니 생각보다 시설과 식당들이 너무 고퀄이라 올인클루시브를 추가 결제 했습니다. 다만, 늦게 간 당일은 빼고 2박째 오전부터 올인클루시브를 사용할 수 있어서 좋았습니다 ~. 

주변에 편의점도 있어서 필요 시 이용 할 수 있어서 좋았습니다. 내부에 예약이 필요한 식당들도 있는데 좋았어요. 그리고 바다뷰가 아니어도 생각보다 괜찮았고, 1층은 발코니로 외부와 바로 연결되어있어서 굉장히 동선이 편했습니다  :)  

이번 여행에서 3군데 호텔을 들렀는데, 칸쿤여행을 다시간다면 여기에 숙박할 예정입니다.

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: 가고싶지않은곳”
content: 높은 곳 에서 바라보는 바다만 좋고 호텔 방 내에는 있고싶지않은곳입니다.

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: 가격대비 만족스러운 호텔”
content: 가격에 비해 호텔 수준이 높습니다. 시내까지 거리가 다소 멀다.

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: 최고의 호텔”
content: 가격대비 좋은 숙소입니다. 추천합니다.

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: 훌륭한 리조트 호텔”
content:
시설도 훌륭하고 조식, 석식 부페도 훌륭합니다.
한 열흘간 푹 쉬면서 호텔 바로 앞의 바다와 호텔의 풀장등 시설을 즐기면 좋을 것 같아요.
방도 아주 널직하게 크고 대단히 만족합니다.
다만 흠이라면 리조트가 너무 커서 식당이나 바다에 갈 때 동선이 좀 깁니다.

hotel_name: 엠포리오 칸쿤 (Emporio Cancun)
title: Great accommodations ”
content: It was a great experience to stay here!  Magnificent view of sea and pool, perfect breakfast, a cozy bed, various beverage, and so on… I want to visit again someday and also recommend to my friends. The only thing unpleasant was that one worker at the bar stretched his eyes when I answered him the country I came from. I hope his behavior was from ignorance.

hotel_name: 알로프트 칸쿤 (Aloft Cancun)
title: 녹물이나오는 호텔”
content: 아침에 씻으려니 샤워기와 세면대에 검은물과 녹물이나옴. 물론 어떤 사고나 갑작스러운 문제는 언제든 생길수있으나 프론트 대응이 정말실망이다. 프론트는 10분있으면 고쳐진다고 기다리라함. 식사하고 한시간후에 다시 물을틀었으나 녹물은 그대로나오고 이것저것 시도해보니 온수쪽이 녹물이나오는것같아 냉수로 샤워함. 체크아웃할때 죄송하다는사과도없음. 녹물 나오는호텔은 상한음식을 내는 식당과같다.다신가고싶지않음.

content: 수영장도 프라이빗비치도 크고 넓어서 물놀이하고 놀기 아주 좋은 숙소였습니다! 직원들도 모두들 너무 친절하셔서 지내는 동안에 기분좋게 지낼수있었습니당 다만 위치가 너무 호텔존이랑 멀어서 아쉬웠고ㅠㅠ 방 청소 상태는 대부분 좋았지만 베개커버에서 냄새가 좀 났고 침대시트 얼룩이 좀 있었습니다ㅠㅠ 이 외에는 너무 좋은 기억뿐입니다! 완벽한 휴식을 즐기고 싶다면 추천드립니당

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 개드러움”
content: 베게랑 이불에서 썩은내남

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 여유로운 신혼여행”
content: 액티비티 하지 않고 충분히 호텔의 편의시설을 누리면서 여유롭게 신혼여행을 보내기 좋은 곳입니다!!

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 코르키를 찾으세요”
content:
버틀러가 졸라 친절했음. 스몰토크 싫어하는 내향인부부도 그런 친절한 분위기에 매우 만족할 정도임. 음식 맛있고 수영장 이쁜거는 아마 다른 리뷰로 충분하겠지만 이 호텔의 장점은 플로어마다 있는 버틀러가 친절했다는 것임.
스칼렛 아르떼도 갔다왔는데 그곳은 시설이나 전경이 훨씬 더 좋았지만 개인적으로 코랄의 서비스가 더 기억에 많이 남았음.
혹시 버틀러를 지정하거나 층을 바꿀수 있다면 코르헤? 코르키?가 매우 친절했던것만 기억하면 될듯 굳굳 아주 좋음

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 최고의 휴식처”
content:
신혼여행으로 방문했는데, 휴양그자체입니다
버틀러와 메신저로 수시로 소통하기때문에
영어를 꼭 잘하지않더라도 
전혀 문제되지않고
올인크루시브는 말하지않아도 행복 그자체이지요

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 최고였어요”
content:
거리가 좀 멀어서 힘들긴 한데
직원분들이 정말 정말 너무 친절하고
레스토랑 전부 다 가보진 못했지만
추천해준 곳인 스테이크랑 시푸드 하는곳 갔는데
대만족스러웠습니다.

수영장 완벽했고 디제이, 연주 최고였어요

근데 침실 침구가 좀 습해서 꿉꿉한게 조금 힘들었습니다ㅠ

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 완벽...”
content:
다 필요 없고 하루 종일 술만 먹어도 본전 나와요... 술만 생각하고 갔는데 수영장. 해변. 산책로. 식당 등등 너무 과하게 넓지 않게 조성된 호텔 단지 돌아다니다 보면 곳곳에 신경 많이 쓰고 제대로 된 호텔인게 티가 납니다. 돈 하나도 안아깝네요. 몇 일 더 할 걸 하는 후회만... 
아 유일한 단점. 셔틀이 없다는 점... 칸쿤 다니면 스칼렛 버스는 많이 돌아다니는데 하다못해 공항 셔틀이라도 좀 있으면 좋지 않았을까...

content: 깔끔,서비스최고

hotel_name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun, an All Inclusive Resort
title: 칸쿤내 리조트 중 훌륭합니다”
content:
칸쿤내 리조트 중 훌륭합니다, 우선 카리브해변이 있어서 호텔존 전부 바다색이 예쁘구요
레스토랑도 맛있습니다, 수영장 수건 등을 셀프로 놓는건 동남아리조트, 한국리조트 등과 비교했을때 하얏트 수준에 비해 서비스가 부족하다고 생각했습니다

hotel_name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun, an All Inclusive Resort
title: 장소, 위치 좋음 하지만”
content: 가격에 비해 서비스가 우월하진 않아서 아쉬움

hotel_name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun, an All Inclusive Resort
title: 아고다 예약 후 다시한번 체크하세요”
content:
작년 기분 나쁜 일을 당한 이후로 아고다 절대 이용하지 않으리라 다짐헀는데
오랜만에 로그인해서 후기를 남깁니다.

신혼여행으로 아고다를 통해 하얏트 지바를 예약했는데
1. 당일 숙소 체크인 시 아고다 통해서 예약 한 방이 아니라 2단계나 낮은 방으로 예약되어있었음 (어덜트빌딩 자쿠지방으로 예약헀는데 제일 기본룸으로 예약되어있음)
2. 허니문이여서 돈을 더 주고라도 업그레이드 원하였으나, 당일 풀부킹으로 업글 불가 
* 1시간동안 실갱이 한 결과 걍 클럽동으로 업글(하지만 내가 에약한방보다는 낮은 등급)해서 묶기로함.
3. 한국와서도 어찌된 일인지 알아보니, 아고다의 잘못으로 방이 잘못 예약전달되었음
4. 아고다와 약 두달여간 메일로 싸움
5. 결국 약간의 환불을 받음.
결론 : 과정에 있어서 아고다 측의 말도 안되는 응대로 아고다를 다시 이용하지 않곘다 생각함.
숙소는 매우 좋으나, 아고다 실망

hotel_name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun, an All Inclusive Resort
title: 음식진짜별로”
content:
음식타서나오고 , 룸서비스 기본40분이상 , 짜고, 아시아레스토랑도 너무 느끼하고짬
중국인많음.

title: 신행에 적합한”
content:
1. 교통편 : 호텔픽업이 있는지 모르겠으나 업체가 운영하는 셔틀타고 개인적으로 감.
2. 방컨디션 : 매우 넓고 여러날 묵는동안 짐을 정리해뚤 공간이 충분함
3. 음식 : 룸서비스는 식어서 온다는 블로그도 봤는데 딱히 그렇지 않음. 언제든 먹고 마실수 있음. 
4. 풀 : 1층에 3개 12층에 1개있는데 쉬고 잠깐씩 놀기 좋음. 일부풀은 바닥이 타일이 아니라 긁힐 수 있음.
5. 서비스 : 한국어도 얼추 통하고 한국어로 된 서비스태블릿 이용함. 
6. 총평 : 밤엔 공연도 해주고 나무늘보처럼 종일 늘어지게 있을 수 있음. 라군 : 바다 뷰는 정말 아름다움. 바다는 엄청 투명하진 않고 해초도 많지만 위에서 보는 모습은 장관임.

hotel_name: 시크릿 더 바인 칸쿤 리조트 앤 스파 - 올인클루시브 - 성인 전용 (Secrets The Vine Cancun Resort & Spa - All inclusive - Adults only)

hotel_name: 캐노피 바이 힐튼 칸쿤 라 이슬라 (Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla)
title: 위치가 좋어요”
content:
라이슬라 쇼핑몰과 붙어 있어 위치는 좋아요. 다만 체크인시 청소가 안되 저녁 6시에 들어 갔네요. 룸은 깨끗하고 청소 상태도
좋습니다. 다만 4층에 머물렀는데 수압이 약합니다. 쇼핑몰과 붙어 있어 구경할 것은 많은데 물가가 한국보다 비싸 살만한게
없어요.

hotel_name: 캐노피 바이 힐튼 칸쿤 라 이슬라 (Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla)
title: 숙소”
content: 잠깐 머물기에 좋아요

hotel_name: 캐노피 바이 힐튼 칸쿤 라 이슬라 (Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla)
title: 몇일 간은 이곳저곳 돌아 다닐꺼라 선택”
content: 가성비 좋아요. 처음부터 올 인클루시브로 안가고 시내 투어시 묵었는데 만족해요

hotel_name: 캐노피 바이 힐튼 칸쿤 라 이슬라 (Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla)
title: 최적의 위치에 깨끗한 부띠끄 호텔”
content: 실내는 깨끗하고 쾌적해서 좋습니다. 인테리어도 트랜디하고 베드랑 쇼파에 행잉체어까지, 너무 예뻐요! 그리고 라이슬라 쇼핑몰과 연결되어 있어서, 위치적으로도 굉장히 좋습니다.호텔 루프탑 수영장도 작지만 깨끗하고, 옆에 있는 풀바도 분위기가 정말좋아요!  다만 객실내 테라스가 없고, 욕실이 매우 좁아서 비즈니스호텔정도의 수준입니다. 그리고 호텔내 부대시설이 별로 없어요.  신혼여행객들이 낮에 관광하고 저녁에 잠깐 머무르기 좋아요. 근데 낮부터 저녁까지 호텔에서 쉬고 싶다면 적당한 호텔은 아닌 것 같습니다

hotel_name: 캐노피 바이 힐튼 칸쿤 라 이슬라 (Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla)
title: 가격대비 만족해요 깨끗하고 좋아요”
content:
투어다니려고 투어다닐때는 가성비호텔에 머물고싶어서 예약했어요
근데 왠걸 너무 좋네요
새호텔이어서그런지 모두 신식이에요 깨끗하고 다 새거에요
라이슬라 쇼핑몰이랑 연결되어있어서 위치도 굿굿
대박 강추에요 가성비도 굿
음식은 라이슬라 쇼핑몰에서 사먹었어요

content: 실내는 깨끗하고 쾌적해서 좋습니다. 인테리어도 트랜디하고 베드랑 쇼파에 행잉체어까지, 너무 예뻐요! 그리고 라이슬라 쇼핑몰과 연결되어 있어서, 위치적으로도 굉장히 좋습니다.호텔 루프탑 수영장도 작지만 깨끗하고, 옆에 있는 풀바도 분위기가 정말좋아요!  다만 객실내 테라스가 없고, 욕실이 매우 좁아서 비즈니스호텔정도의 수준입니다. 그리고 호텔내 부대시설이 별로 없어요.  신혼여행객들이 낮에 관광하고 저녁에 잠깐 머무르기 좋아요. 근데 낮부터 저녁까지 호텔에서 쉬고 싶다면 적당한 호텔은 아닌 것 같습니다

hotel_name: 캐노피 바이 힐튼 칸쿤 라 이슬라 (Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla)
title: 숙소”
content: 잠깐 머물기에 좋아요

hotel_name: 캐노피 바이 힐튼 칸쿤 라 이슬라 (Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla)
title: 아내와 함께 에름 휴가를”
content:
공공 해변에서 좀 떨어져 있다는 점 제외하고 오히려 쇼핑단지가 붙어 있어 좋았습니다. 
먹는 거. 쇼핑, 구경 등..
해변은 호텔에서 나와서 순환버스 타면 버스로 10분 정도 가면 퍼블릭 비치가 있고 버스가 거의 5분 주기로 순환하고 있어 불편함은 없었습니다.
올인클루시브는 없지만, 오히려 이 호텔 이용했던게 만족도가 더 높네요.

title: 접근성이 좋고 깔끔함”
content: 이슬라 무헤레스에 가기에도 버스가 자주 다녀 이동하기 편리했고, 숙소 근처  쇼핑몰이 있어 쇼핑과 식사를 해결하고 둘러보기 좋았습니다.

투어다니려고 투어다닐때는 가성비호텔에 머물고싶어서 예약했어요
근데 왠걸 너무 좋네요
새호텔이어서그런지 모두 신식이에요 깨끗하고 다 새거에요
라이슬라 쇼핑몰이랑 연결되어있어서 위치도 굿굿
대박 강추에요 가성비도 굿
음식은 라이슬라 쇼핑몰에서 사먹었어요

hotel_name: Unico Hotel Riviera Maya - All Inclusive - Adults Only
title: Hella Amenities”
content: If you can find a deal on this place take it. They thought of everything. It's location is close to both Playa del Carmen and Tulum.

hotel_name: Unico Hotel Riviera Maya - All Inclusive - Adults Only
title: Just okay”
content: The resort is nice and clean but there are definitely some issues.  It is all inclusive so the food is not spectacular.  Going off resort to eat is a bit difficult though given the location.  The only thing is close are other hotels.  Tulum is about 30 minute drive but worth it for more authentic eating options.  Also since it is all inclusive they will try and sell a membership which can be a little annoying when on vacation.  Resort does need some upgrades, the swim up pool tiles are breaking and while the showers are large, the toilet room is a bit outdated.   I also think we had bed bugs because I broke out with these little annoying bumps after a couple days.  Pool service was great, they should get newer nicer towels though.  They have an unwritten rule about leaving your things at pool area longer than an hour that apparently only applied to us as my things were moved and trashed on my first day after 45 minutes.  I was not happy but they tried to make up for it by being extremely nice afterwards.   Second day I got to pool super early pre 9am and watched other peoples items go untouched for nearly 4 hours.  Room service is better than the restaurant food.  And my tv broke on my last night and as opposed to just bring us a new one they offered to relocate us to a new room our last night. I asked for the empty room's tv and they brought it but not sure why I had to be the one to suggest this simple solution.  Overall experience was average.  I would not go back.

hotel_name: Unico Hotel Riviera Maya - All Inclusive - Adults Only
title: Excellente. Luxurious rooms, gourment dinning, stellar service, gorgeous location. ”
content: We've been to the Riviera Maya close over 30 times. Unico 2087 is #1 for the region and of all the places beach vacations we've taken for comfort, value and convenience (includes French Polynesia, Hawaii, and Thailand. Easy short flight from US for us. Luxurious rooms with very comfy beds. Stylish resort. Beach was completely cleared of seaweed when we visited in late August/early Sept. Minimal seaweed when we were there earlier this year for NYE celebration. We enjoyed the beach everyday. Dining here is the best. Cueva Siete is our favorite. Delicious complex flavors highlighted by the stellar service from Carlos and Waldo.  Sushi/Sashimi at Mura is super fresh and delicious and Andres was also great. As was the sushi chef (I didn't get his name). Cocktails & dinning were delicious at all venues. The quality of our dining experiences more than cover the cost of our stay. Excellent value. Thank you also to Mr. Angel Garcia for making our 20th memorable.

hotel_name: Unico Hotel Riviera Maya - All Inclusive - Adults Only
title: Great Adults Only Luxury”
content:
Great option for self-contained, adults-only luxury.  

Rooms are large, service is good and restaurants are some of the best hotel restaurants available in self-contained resorts in Mexico.  I also like the fact that all facilities are new and super fresh/clean.  The styling is also decidedly grown-up and modern.

Already planning a return trip!

title: 우수”
content:
The place is super clean , well maintained and the staff is helpful. The only downside is the food. 5/10. The Mura had the best food, other restaurants were average. Wait time for Breakfast is long (45 min average)  cause only the 20.87 and the small cafe shop were offering breakfast. 
I will loveee you stay again because of the luxurious facilities, spotless rooms and professional staff but the food part is making me double think it. 
But Again, maybe they are cutting on the food budget because of the last year pandemic!

title: Amazing! ”
content: It was my first trip to Mexico and I chose to stay in Tulum. It was truly an experience of a lifetime. title: Super hotel ”
content:
Super hotel propre avec plusieurs piscine et un excellent rapport qualité prix
Seul défaut l'emplacement un peu loin de la plage et du centre ville mais faisable en vélo

hotel_name: The Waves Tulum
title: wifi”
content: the wifi is bad

hotel_name: The Waves Tulum
title: Modernes Hotel mit tollen Pools am Rand von Tulum”
content:
Wir waren 4 Nächte in dem Hotel und hatten ein Studio Apartment. Das Zimmer war sehr großzügig geschnitten, toll eingerichtet mit voll ausgestatteter Küche und privatem Whirlpool. Insgesamt ist die Anlage sehr modern mit schönen Pools.  Das Frühstück ist in Buffetform, einfach aber jeden Tag mit neuen Speisen. Der einzige (große) Nachteil ist die Lage des Hotels fernab von der „Innenstadt“ und auch dem Beach in Tulum. Wir hatten Fahrräder gemietet, empfehlenswert ist aber definitiv ein Auto.  Die Zubringerstraße hat viele Schlaglöcher und die Gegend ist arm. 

Insgesamt hatten wir einen tollen Aufenthalt und abgesehen von der Lage ist das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis für Tulum einzigartig.

hotel_name: Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort - Adults Only
title: Great in theory… Not so great in reality. ”
content:
Unfortunately we didn’t have the best stay at Kore Tulum. 

Pros: Staff we’re very nice, Spacious room.

Cons:  Bath tub extremely dirty, Pool water very dirty, All the food was super bland and underwhelming, Not a wellness retreat at all, Not great location if you want to use the main tourist strips, not enough pool chairs. 

Overall not a great stay and not what we expected from a “Wellness retreat”

title: 최고”
content: Great location, beautiful place. Staff very friendly and delicious food. I would strongly recommend this place.

hotel_name: Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort - Adults Only
title: Outstanding hotel”
content: Kore is just incredible! It really is the perfect place to stay in Tulum. It is close enough to popular beaches and the Tulum ruins up the road if you choose to visit them -all whilst being in your own oasis. It is a short  cycle away from the town centre - bikes are available for complimentary hire from the hotel. Our room was large and always tended to and clean. The pool, bars and view into the sea are amazing . What made this place even more outstanding were the staff - I can not say enough about how kind, attentive and sincere they all are. We will be back!

hotel_name: Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort - Adults Only
title: Horrible Resort”
content:
This is the absolute worst hotel I’ve stayed at in all my years of travelling to Mexico. Nothing was as advertised or seen on Social media.
There’s no vibe at!!!! So so boring! 
The food is way below average and was the same for our entire 4 day stay. 
The kitchen staff with the exception of Eliseo and Emmanuel were all rude and uninterested in serving guests.
Front desk….also horrible. No one can answer your questions or seem delighted to help.

I would never recommend this place….AT ALL!!!

hotel_name: Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort - Adults Only
title: 무난함”
content: Highly do not recommend. No power no hot water no water pressure. Thumbs down

hotel_name: Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort - Adults Only
title: It was Ok ”
content: Pluses. Strong AC. Nice and cold. Hot tub in my room. Took over an hour to fill, used it once. Hotel is all inclusive. So even room service is technically free which is nice. IF you like cheap quality wings, burgers and watered down drinks. The margaritas were the worst I've EVER had. Mojitos much better. There were a lot of mosquitos. No staff burning copal like other resorts did to ward off mosquitos. Biggest complaint is NO COVID testing, it's a 47 min walk in the 95 degree HEAT to the nearest test site. They lied and told me 10 min walk. Nearly died of heatstroke to get a stupid covid test. Need that to return to most countries. Other hotels offer it to their guests why not here?! Also, $120 for a 50 min massage is a rip off anywhere, especially in Mexico. If you like being in the center of the bars, restaurants area, this hotel is NOT. It's a $20 cab ride or long walk, if you plan to leave the resort to go anywhere.

hotel_name: Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort - Adults Only
title: Great in theory… Not so great in reality. ”
content:
Unfortunately we didn’t have the best stay at Kore Tulum. 

Pros: Staff we’re very nice, Spacious room.

Cons:  Bath tub extremely dirty, Pool water very dirty, All the food was super bland and underwhelming, Not a wellness retreat at all, Not great location if you want to use the main tourist strips, not enough pool chairs. 

Overall not a great stay and not what we expected from a “Wellness retreat”

hotel_name: Mayan Monkey Tulum - Adults Only
title: Epic”
content: Apart from losing all our wallets and phones due to excessive drinking and partying with amazing people and staff..,.... we had an Epic time at the Monkey 🐒  one that us and others around us will never forget.  Mind blowing experience...... I would definitely relive Mayan Monkey again.  No such thing as a bad experience.

hotel_name: Mayan Monkey Tulum - Adults Only
title: Overrated Hostel”
content: Tulum is overrated to begin with and there's this hostel with overpriced drinks, claims of being a party hostel and terrible bar staff who demands for tips in exchange for serving what seems to me is an expensive alcohol free cocktail. Food looks good... for instagram tho😂 This hostel is NOISY! I'm alright with the music playing until 1am but the construction going on around is just loud.

hotel_name: Mayan Monkey Tulum - Adults Only
title: good in Tulum”
content: Was there like two periods, before christmas and newyearseve`` week. Clear its bit expensiev but in between the hostels on Tulum is one of the bests. good party ambient that you can avoid easily. Nice kitchen and curtain hided comfortable beds. 2 bathroom each room. Quality price is one of best in tulum if you are not paying more than 350 pesos. Depending on the quantity of people would reach 2000 Pesos. Not bad

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Beautiful hotel on the beach  with lovely sea view”
content:
Loved everything about this place. It was my 5th time in Playa and I stayed in very nice boutique hotels before but this exceeded all my expectations.
Location couldn't be better: just off the quinta avenida on the beach side.. all the rooms have spacious terraces with tables and hammocks which wee great for chilling out in the evening.. the rooms on the beach front are slightly more expensive but they have better sea view than the ones on the back..
it was my sister's birthday and when they heard about this they arranged a nice cake and they decorated the room with baloons and flowers.. a lovely touch!
staff were extremely polite and friendly and this is one of the few hotel in playa which has a pool right on the beach which was very welcome during those days when the sea was a bit rough.. 
overall it was great value for money and I will definitely reccomend it to all my friends and family..

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Good service, okay location”
content: whole the windows were helpful, there are a number of dance clubs around the corner with music blaring until 8am.  the air conditioning barely worked in room 310. the beach is nice, but you cant get in the water as dozens of boats are mored out front. room okay, matress very firm, no restaurant,and continental breakfast was poor, but the restuarant two doors down was excelent. staff were all great!

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: 雨季の滞在で残念でした”
content:
４泊しましたが、滞在時間のうち晴れてたのは３０％くらいでした。
ロケーションは悪くないのですが、近くのビーチバーの騒音が朝方（特に土曜日）まで聞こえ残念でした。部屋は十分な広さがあり清潔さも問題なかったです。部屋に持ってきてくれる朝食のクロワッサンが美味でした。またフロントスタッフはとてもフレンドリーでこちらの要望、質問に対応してくれました。

滞在中、かなりの時間雨に降られてしまいました。晴天だったら素晴らしい滞在になったと思います。

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Etape intime et rafraichissante”
content: petit hôtel sur la plage, proche de tout mais à l'abri du brouhaha des bars et de la rue. Les chambres qui donnent sur la piscine et les cocotiers du jardin sont confortables, propres et bien équipées (frigidaire, kitchenette, nespresso...). Petit déjeuner basique servi dans les chambres ou sur la terrasse de chaque chambre. Personnel charmant et réactif. la piscine très propres et particulièrement appréciée en période de sargasses abondantes sur la plage.

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Schönes Hotel an einem verdrecktem Strand”
content:
- Lage top ( sehr zentral)
- Essen Top 
- Personal Top
- Strand ( Meer war dunkel braun, geruch von Kanalisation),  wobei es nicht schlimm war , da man 200-400 meter nach rechts läuft das Meer schöner wird.

Kann man nur empfehlen 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: 우수”
content: Nice quaint place.  I got the room on sale so it was a good deal. My only complaint is it needs more beach chairs. In the afternoon there was no where to sit on the beach and the beach area is very small.

content: 호텔의 위치나 객실의 컨디션과 대비하여 아주 좋은 호텔이 였습니다. 특히나 생각했던 것 보다 조식이 맛이 있어서 더 좋았습니다. 가성비 있는 숙소를 생각하신다면 추천하고 싶습니다.

맛있는 로컬 음식과 맥시코 분위기를 느끼기 좋은 곳

hotel_name: 세레니티 호텔 부티크 (Serenity Hotel Boutique)
title: Great place”
content: Good place. Would stay again.

hotel_name: 세레니티 호텔 부티크 (Serenity Hotel Boutique)
title: No comfort ”
content:
The best thing in this hotel are : the staff and very clean .
The breakfast very limited poor and stingy , always you have to eat other breakfast outside . 
Beds : the worst ever very small twin size and uncomfortable, every day I wake up with back pain and exhausted . 
Honestly . There so much better options in playa del Carmen and so much cheaper and so much better than serenity .

hotel_name: 세레니티 호텔 부티크 (Serenity Hotel Boutique)
title: 최고”
content: Very good

hotel_name: 세레니티 호텔 부티크 (Serenity Hotel Boutique)
title: Not as advertised.”
content: Very sad that this hotel was not as advertised. No bar, limited restaurant, lots of surrounding construction. We left and moved to the Thompson Main House which was FABULOUS.

hotel_name: 세레니티 호텔 부티크 (Serenity Hotel Boutique)
title: Not great ”
content: The hotel room is exactly as picture in the photos so that’s great, but that’s pretty much it. The staff charged us a hidden tax ( Agoda called the hotel because it’s their responsibility to inform us if there will be and they didn’t take responsibility), we requested prices for COVID tests and they never got back to us. The hotel is a bit far from all the clubs and nightlife, the pool is quite depressing , at night there is a doorman and not proper security. The best thing of the hotel is the room service, worth ordering

hotel_name: 호텔 HM 플라야 델 카르멘 (Hotel HM Playa del Carmen)
title: 가성비 굿”
content:
스칼렛 갈거 아님 여기도 좋아요! 
조식도 먹을만했어요

hotel_name: 호텔 HM 플라야 델 카르멘 (Hotel HM Playa del Carmen)
title: 위치가 너무 좋아요”
content:
칸쿤에 가면 보통 고급 올인클루시브 에 많이
머무르는데 .. 스칼렛에서 하얏트 로 넘어 가기전 
플라야델카르만 을 느껴 보고 싶어 2일
머무른 숙소인데 위치가 너무 좋고 멕시코 여행중 잊지 못할 2일이었습니다

hotel_name: 호텔 HM 플라야 델 카르멘 (Hotel HM Playa del Carmen)
title: 숨겨진 최고의 숙소”
content:
가성비 최고에요
가겨대비 너무 좋은 시설을 갖추고있어요
잘 찾아간거같아 대만족이에요

title: 우수”

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: Good location!”
content: The location was very good and all staff was very kind. Room was humongus and loved the balcony. The roof rop music was too loud in some sense though

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: Great value for money”
content: The hotel has everything you need, the room have everything you need, breakfast is great and the location is perfect

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: 우수”
content: The hotel room was definitely nice and the facilities looked great. I loved the breakfast that was served! It was outstanding.  One thing I wasn’t too big on were the staff trying to convince you to become a part of a time-share type of program. They are way too aggressive and it’s stressful to deal with when you’re on vacation and just trying to enjoy your time there with your loved one. That would be my only complaint but the hotel itself was nice and the stay was great! It can also be fairly humid in the rooms so be aware if that

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: Reef28”
content: A few things and it would be a 5 star. They need to put bathrobes in the suites and body lotion and hair conditioner, plus the usual toiletries. The restaurants are outstanding, especially the Mexican. This is Mexican food, but not as you know it

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: Not for me”
content: Not for me. They didn’t give any information once arrived. Had to ask about everything there. No Communition

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: Great hotel room and location.  Skip the indoor dining”
content: The room is beautiful. It's large and clean.  The  music coming from the restaurant across the street is so loud that you don't  want to sit outside  on the balcony  but the soundproofing  of the windows is good so you don't  hear much  of it. The staff were friendly.  The rooftop pool is great. Loved the location.  15 minutes walking from the ADO bus, close the tourist street full of restaurants and souvenirs and only 1 block from the beach. The food at all the restaurants were extremely  bland (Mexican, Italian,  Asian). The only good food was surprisingly the food at the rooftop  patio.

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)

One thing I wasn’t too big on were the staff trying to convince you to become a part of a time-share type of program. That would be my only complaint but the hotel itself was nice and the stay was great! It can also be fairly humid in the rooms so be aware if that

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: A perfect vacation 🥂”
content: My wife and I really enjoyed our stay at the hotel, the room we got was a bit noisy and blocked the view, but apart from that everything was excellent, the chef tried very hard to provide us with food that suited us, I highly recommend the all inclusive to enjoy unlimited free drinks and meals, very much enhances the vacation to sum up a final score of 4 out of 5

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: 보통”
content: nice place  2 block walk to the beach  just not much fun

title: Awesome resort”
content: I had a wonderful experience at the Reef 28! The rooms were modern, clean, and very spacious. The staff was super friendly and accommodating. The food was the only negative for us. There wasn’t enough variety and it was average at best honestly. But the location is literally a block away from the fifth ave strip of restaurants, so that helped. Overall I would recommend this hotel and rate it 7/10.

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: 최고”
content: The staff were amazing, having access to the 3 properties was amazing and the food was very high standard. Will definitely go back here!

hotel_name: Aloft Playa del Carmen
title: TOP IN PDC”
content:
Top modern..Neu 
Eim grosses Plus ist der Supermarkt im Erdgeschoß und das aktuelle kostenfreie Parken  im Parkhaus  zumal Parken  ansonsten überall kostet

hotel_name: Aloft Playa del Carmen
title: I don’t even know where to start!”
content: This hotel was my favourite! The rooftop is insane and the location is perfect!!! We loved the grocery store is just downstairs and how the 5th avenue was just a few mins away! The room itself was amazing and very modern and lots of sunlight coming in! Loved every bit of it

hotel_name: Aloft Playa del Carmen
title: Convenient location, great rooftop pool!”
content: The rooms are clean and modern and the rooftop pools are beautiful with a view to the sea. There is a supermarket in the building itself which is super convenient and you are close to restaurants around. There was some construction going on during the day but there was a note about it so maybe check with the hotel before booking. It seems a bit isolated when you first arrive but it is a good bargain.
